doctor.info: Professor Dr. Gopen Kumar Kundu passed MBBS from Sir Salimullah Medical College, Dhaka in January 1997, and passed Diploma in child Health (DCH) in July, 2001 from BSMMU. Then he obtained Doctor of Medicine (MD) degree in Paediatric Neurology from Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University (BSMMU).
